abstract: Carl C. Icahn offered a $220 million loan to Mentor Graphics, the latest salvo in his continuing takeover battle with the software maker.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn offered a $220 million loan to Mentor Graphics, the latest salvo in his continuing takeover battle with the software maker.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn offered a $220 million loan to Mentor Graphics, the latest salvo in his continuing takeover battle with the software maker.

headline.main: Icahn Offers a Loan to Mentor Graphics
